main event: A single object resembling the size of a baseball was observed making a whistling sound in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes,The object was blue-grey in color,The observer was servicing a car at the time of the sighting,The object moved from NE to SW and then behind a mountain, There is insufficient data to evaluate the sighting further.
witness description: the observer was servicing a car
